$PQEFF If someone had given you PQEFF as a lotto at .015 cents before the buy out would you have taken it? Really ask yourself and be honest.

GXXM is my next OTC lotto. $10 million market cap so buying it today is the equivalent of being able to purchase PQEFF for .015. Is it a high risk play? Yes.... But then again so was PQEFF before the buy out. Sometimes you have to go with your gut and hold on tight.
